channel.title: What's new on IBM TV
channel.description: What's new on IBM TV: IT Solutions from IBM. Tune into videos, podcasts, demos and webcasts from IBM.
channel.itunes:subtitle: What's new on IBM TV: IT Solutions from IBM
channel.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
channel.itunes:summary: IBM TV is your portal to IT solutions you can listen to and watch. Videos. Webcasts. Podcasts. And more. Hot topics. Web 2.0. Virtual worlds. Social computing. SOA. IT Service Mnagement. IT solutions from IBM for organizations of any size. This podcast introduces you to IBM TV. Learn what IT categories are covered. Learn how to tune in and stay up to date with the latest content and resources from IBM TV at www.ibm.com/ibmtv. Subscribe to this free podcast so you can have the latest episodes delivered to you as soon as they are available.

item.title: Final Episode- Farewell and Thank You
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IBM TV provides you with key information about IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: This is the final episode of the series, as IBM wishes to provide its audience with a richer multimedia and interactive experience about IT Solutions from IBM--especially with the increasing use and function of Web 2.0 and Social Media technologies.
item.itunes:keywords: IBM, IBM_TV, podcast, video, screencast, webcast, multimedia, Green, Linux, Credit_Crunch, Joe_Washington

item.title: Episode 09 - What's New on IBM TV
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IBM TV provides you with key information about IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: IBM TV provides our IBM customers with a multimedia portal for IT Solutions and delivers content in the form of videos, screencasts, webcasts, podcasts and related links and offers. This episode highlights Smarter Planet, as well as Smart SOA and the value of zSeries.
item.itunes:keywords: IBM, IBM_TV, podcast, video, screencast, webcast, multimedia, Green, Linux, Credit_Crunch, Joe_Washington

item.title: IBM TV--Video--Smarter Planet and Testimonials from System z and Power Systems customers
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IBM TV provides you with key information about IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: IBM TV is a multimedia portal that delivers videos, webcasts, screencasts, podcasts, related links and offers to IBM customers worldwide. In this particular anchor video, IBM introduces the leadership for a SMARTER PLANET.
item.itunes:keywords: IBM, IBM_TV, podcast, video, screencast, webcast, multimedia, Green, Linux, Credit_Crunch, Joe_Washington

item.title: IBM TV--Video--The Mobile Web, Information Explosion and Business Event Processing
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IBM TV provides you with key information about IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: What's New on IBM TV is a podcast series that contains the Anchor Episodes from the IBM TV multimedia portal at www.ibm.com/ibmtv. Join Joe Washington, the anchor host, to learn more about IT Solutions from IBM.
item.itunes:keywords: IBM, IBM_TV, podcast, video, screencast, webcast, multimedia, Green, Linux, Credit_Crunch, Joe_Washington

item.title: Episode 08 - What's New on IBM TV
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IBM TV provides you with key information about IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: This podcast series brings you a summary of the latest content at www.ibm.com/IBMTV--including the videos, webcasts, podcasts, screencasts, demos and related links to IBM IT Solutions content.
item.itunes:keywords: IBM, IBM_TV, podcast, video, screencast, webcast, multimedia, Green, Linux, Credit_Crunch, Joe_Washington

item.title: IBM TV--Video--Green Computing, Linux Solutions and Beating the Credit Crunch
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IBM TV provides you with key information about IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: IBM TV is a multimedia portal from IBM that provides you with information about IT solutions. IBM TV features videos, podcasts, Webcasts, demos, screencasts, as well as links to related IBM content. Check out the latest news and IT solutions with our IBM TV host, Joe Washington.
item.itunes:keywords: Joe_Washington, IBM, multimedia, portal, video, webcast, screencast, podcast, webinar, Green, Linux, Credit_Crunch

item.title: Episode 07- What's New on IBM TV
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: Multimedia Portal for IT Solutions
item.itunes:summary: IBM TV is a multimedia portal from IBM that rovides you wtih information about IT Solutions, featuring videos, podcasts, webcasts, screencasts, demos and related links to other IT solution content. This provides you with the latest content refresh and the highlights from the anchor episode, hosted by our anchor reporter, Joe Washington.

item.title: IBM TV-Video-Global CEO Study- and more
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IT Solutions from IBM
item.itunes:summary: Over 1,000 CEOs reveal a future of rapid change. IBM Project Big Green makes big news. Feel the Pulse. Hear the Jazz. And more.
item.itunes:keywords: IBM, IBM TV, Multimedia, video, CEO, Podcast, screencast, webcast, webinar, podcasts, screencasts, IT,

item.title: What's New on IBM TV-- episode 04
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IT Solutions from IBM
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, you can see IBM's Vision for the New Enterprise Data Center with new System z 10. Also, there is more details on IBM's acquisition of Cognos.

item.title: What's New on IBM TV--episode 03
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IT Solutions from IBM
item.itunes:summary: Episode 03 of this podcast covers (1) Upcoming IBM conferences including Pulse 2008, Impact 2008 and Rational Software Development Conference 2008; (2) Project Big Green; and IBM's involvement in preserving wildlife. This was produced and brought to you by IBM Integrated Marketing Communications Center of Excellence and the IBM TV team. Web site for IBM TV is: www.ibm.com/ibmtv or www.ibm.com/ibmtv/play
item.itunes:keywords: IBM TV, video, podcast, new media, rich media, webcast, screencast, multimedia, computer, IT solutions, software, hardware, systems, storage, web 2.0, social media, social networking, Linux, Deep Computing

item.title: What's New on IBM TV episode 02
item.itunes:author: IBM Integrated Marketing Communications
item.itunes:subtitle: IT Solutions from IBM
item.itunes:summary: IBM TV is a multimedia portal from IBM that provides you with information about IT solutions from IBM. It features videos, podcasts, webcasts, demos, screencasts and links to related IBM Content. This episode highlights the IBM Information on Demand conference and features a side-by-side comparison of IBM BladeCenter S with the HP BladeSystem c3000.
